org.openbel.framework.core.kamstore.data.jdbc
Class KAMCatalogDao

java.lang.Object
  org.openbel.framework.core.df.AbstractJdbcDAO
      org.openbel.framework.core.kamstore.data.jdbc.KAMCatalogDao

public final class KAMCatalogDao
extends AbstractJdbcDAO

KAMCatalogDao provides a JDBC-driven DAO for accessing the KAM catalog of the KAMStore.

Author:
Julian Ray jray@selventa.com

Constructor Detail

KAMCatalogDao

public KAMCatalogDao(DBConnection dbc,
                     String kamCatalogSchema,
                     String kamSchemaPrefix)
              throws SQLException
Creates a KAMStoreDaoImpl from the Jdbc Connection that will be used to load the KAM.

Parameters:
dbc - Connection, the database connection which should be non-null and already open for sql execution.
kamCatalogSchema - String, the kam catalog schema
Throws:
InvalidArgument - Thrown if dbc is null or the sql connection is already closed.
SQLException - Thrown if a sql error occurred while loading the KAM.
Method Detail

getCatalog

public List<KAMCatalogDao.KamInfo> getCatalog()
                                       throws SQLException
Retrieves the KAMCatalogDao.KamInfo objects from the KAM catalog database.

If the kam doesn't exist then a null KAMCatalogDao.KamInfo is returned.

Returns:
KAMCatalogDao.KamInfo, the kam info object from the kam catalog database or null if the kam name cannot be found.
Throws:
SQLException - Thrown if a SQL error occurred while retrieving the KAMCatalogDao.KamInfo objects from the kam catalog.

getKamInfoByName

public KAMCatalogDao.KamInfo getKamInfoByName(String kamName)
                                       throws SQLException
Retrieves a KAMCatalogDao.KamInfo object, from the KAM catalog database, using the KAM's name.

Parameters:
name - String, the KAM name
Returns:
KAMCatalogDao.KamInfo, the queried KAM or null if no KAM is found by the name
Throws:
SQLException - Thrown if a SQL error occurred while retrieving the KAMCatalogDao.KamInfo object by kam name.

getKamInfoById

public KAMCatalogDao.KamInfo getKamInfoById(int id)
                                     throws SQLException
Retrieves a KAMCatalogDao.KamInfo object, from the KAM catalog database, using the KAM's id.

Parameters:
id, - the KAM id
Returns:
KAMCatalogDao.KamInfo, the queried KAM or null if no KAM is found by that id
Throws:
SQLException - Thrown if a SQL error occurred while retrieving the KAMCatalogDao.KamInfo object by kam id.

saveToCatalog

public void saveToCatalog(KamDbObject updated)
                   throws SQLException
Saves the KamDbObject object to the KAM catalog database.

If the kamDb doesn't exist then create it, otherwise update the record's information. This method will look for an existing kamDb first by id, if that is not null, then by name. It can be used to update the name of the record, but it cannot be used to update the id.

Parameters:
kamInfo - KamDbObject, the kam info to save to the kam catalog, which cannot be null, and must contain a non-null name
Throws:
SQLException - Thrown if a SQL error occurred saving the kam info to the kam catalog
InvalidArgument - Thrown if kamDb is null or contains a null name.

deleteFromCatalog

public void deleteFromCatalog(String kamName)
                       throws SQLException
Deletes the KAMCatalogDao.KamInfo object with a provided name from the KAM catalog database.

Parameters:
kamName, - the name of a kam info object to delete from the kam catalog
Throws:
SQLException - Thrown if a SQL error occurred deleting the kam info object from the kam catalog
